name: RI_1_1_27_Decrypt_Record_Entries
title: RI.1.1.27 Decrypt Record Entries (Function)
description: Decrypt Records Entries (1 or more instances)
purpose:
Decrypt Record Lifecycle Event - occurs when an agent causes the system to decode record entry content from a cipher. 

Reference: ISO 21089-2018, Section 15.27.

statement.label: RI.1.1.27#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to render decrypted Record Entry content based on a cipher.

statement.label: RI.1.1.27#02
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD maintain the original and all previous versions of the Record Entry, retaining each version instance without alteration.

statement.label: RI.1.1.27#03
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture a new uniquely identifiable version of the Record Entry, incorporating decrypted content.
